name: GoblinSlayer
description:
It's a game made for DiscordJam #7.

It's a fighting game were you can only attack left or rigth, but be carefull not to miss, because that goblins look hungry!

Controlls: 

  • Attack: A/D - ArrowLeft/ArrowRigth

ALL THE ASSETS ARE FREE TO USE  (SOME ARE FROM ITCH), I DID NOT MADE ANY OF THE ART
